result.html: An mbíonn dinnéar agat sa bhaileDo you have dinner at home?
result.ponchtml: An mbíonn dinnéar agat sa ḃaileDo you have dinner at home?

result.eng: Do you have breakfast at home?
result.ga: An mbíonn bricfeasta agat sa bhaile
result.orig: An mbíonn bricfeasta agat sa bhaile
result.html: An mbíonn bricfeasta agat sa bhaileDo you have breakfast at home?
result.ponchtml: An mbíonn bricfeasta agat sa ḃaileDo you have breakfast at home?

result.eng: I know well that you are proud of her, and not without reason.
result.ga: Tá a fhios agam go maith go bhfuil tú bródúil aisti agus údar agat
result.orig: Tá a fhios agam go maith go bhfuil tú bródúil aisti agus údar agat
result.html: Tá a fhios agam go maith go bhfuil tú bródúil aisti agus údar agatI know well that you are proud of her, and not without reason.
result.ponchtml: Tá a ḟios agam go maiṫ go ḃfuil tú bródúil aisti agus údar agatI know well that you are proud of her, and not without reason.

result.eng: Do you have a lighter?
result.ga: An bhfuil lastán agat
result.orig: An bhfuil lastán agat
result.html: An bhfuil lastán agatDo you have a lighter?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil lastán agatDo you have a lighter?

result.eng: Be sensible and don't say such things.
result.ga: Bíodh ciall agat agus fág an cineál sin cainte le rá ag duine inteacht eile
result.orig: Bíodh ciall agat agus fág an cineál sin cainte le rá ag duine inteacht eile
result.html: Bíodh ciall agat agus fág an cineál sin cainte le rá ag duine inteacht eileBe sensible and don't say such things.
result.ponchtml: Bíoḋ ciall agat agus fág an cineál sin cainte le rá ag duine inteaċt eileBe sensible and don't say such things.

result.eng: And you should know that they look with favour on what priests say in Dublin.
result.ga: Agus bíodh a fhios agat go mbíonn toradh i mBaile Átha Cliath fá choinne na sagart
result.orig: Agus bíodh a fhios agat go mbíonn toradh i mBaile Átha Cliath fá choinne na sagart
result.html: Agus bíodh a fhios agat go mbíonn toradh i mBaile Átha Cliath fá choinne na sagartAnd you should know that they look with favour on what priests say in Dublin.
result.ponchtml: Agus bíoḋ a ḟios agat go mbíonn toraḋ i mBaile Áṫa Cliaṫ fá ċoinne na sagartAnd you should know that they look with favour on what priests say in Dublin.

result.eng: Have a bit of sense!
result.ga: Bíodh crothán céille agat
result.orig: Bíodh crothán céille agat
result.html: Bíodh crothán céille agatHave a bit of sense!
result.ponchtml: Bíoḋ croṫán céille agatHave a bit of sense!

result.eng: Have a spark of sense!
result.ga: Bíodh trí splaideog chéille agat
result.orig: Bíodh trí splaideog chéille agat
result.html: Bíodh trí splaideog chéille agatHave a spark of sense!
result.ponchtml: Bíoḋ trí splaideog ċéille agatHave a spark of sense!

result.eng: You have the children all confused, if I must say so.
result.ga: Tá na páistí amú agat ó chaithfidh mé a rá leat
result.orig: Tá na páistí amú agat ó chaithfidh mé a rá leat
result.html: Tá na páistí amú agat ó chaithfidh mé a rá leatYou have the children all confused, if I must say so.
result.ponchtml: Tá na páistí amú agat ó ċaiṫfiḋ mé a rá leatYou have the children all confused, if I must say so.

result.eng: How little is what you have done worth to you?
result.ga: Cá beag duit a bhfuil déanta agat
result.orig: Cá beag duit a bhfuil déanta agat
result.html: Cá beag duit a bhfuil déanta agatHow little is what you have done worth to you?
result.ponchtml: Cá beag duit a ḃfuil déanta agatHow little is what you have done worth to you?

result.eng: You should know that going abroad is no picnic.
result.ga: Bíodh a fhios agat nach só ar bith atá i ndán duit ar an choigrích
result.orig: Bíodh a fhios agat nach só ar bith atá i ndán duit ar an choigrích
result.html: Bíodh a fhios agat nach só ar bith atá i ndán duit ar an choigríchYou should know that going abroad is no picnic.
result.ponchtml: Bíoḋ a ḟios agat naċ só ar biṫ atá i ndán duit ar an ċoigríċYou should know that going abroad is no picnic.

result.eng: You will know you shouldn't grab a hen by its wing.
result.ga: Beidh a fhios agat gan greim eiteoga a fháil ar chirc
result.orig: Beidh a fhios agat gan greim eiteoga a fháil ar chirc
result.html: Beidh a fhios agat gan greim eiteoga a fháil ar chircYou will know you shouldn't grab a hen by its wing.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ a ḟios agat gan greim eiteoga a ḟáil ar ċircYou will know you shouldn't grab a hen by its wing.

result.eng: Well, that's the seventh commandment for you, whatever you think of it.
result.ga: Bhail sin an seachtú haithne agat is déan a mhór nó a bheag di
result.orig: Bhail sin an seachtú haithne agat is déan a mhór nó a bheag di
result.html: Bhail sin an seachtú haithne agat is déan a mhór nó a bheag diWell, that's the seventh commandment for you, whatever you think of it.
result.ponchtml: Ḃail sin an seaċtú haiṫne agat is déan a ṁór nó a ḃeag diWell, that's the seventh commandment for you, whatever you think of it.

result.eng: Have you got enough? {after beating}
result.ga: An bhfuil do sháith agat
result.orig: An bhfuil do sháith agat
result.html: An bhfuil do sháith agatHave you got enough? {after beating}
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil do ẛáiṫ agatHave you got enough? {after beating}

result.eng: You know what my advice to you is?
result.ga: 'Bhfuil a fhios agat goidé mo chomhairlese duit
result.orig: 'Bhfuil a fhios agat goidé mo chomhairlese duit
result.html: 'Bhfuil a fhios agat goidé mo chomhairlese duitYou know what my advice to you is?
result.ponchtml: 'Ḃfuil a ḟios agat goidé mo ċoṁairlese duitYou know what my advice to you is?

result.eng: Bright shining lights that would blinden you.
result.ga: Solais loinnireacha gheala a bhainfeadh an t-amharc as an tsúil agat
result.orig: Solais loinnireacha gheala a bhainfeadh an t-amharc as an tsúil agat
result.html: Solais loinnireacha gheala a bhainfeadh an t-amharc as an tsúil agatBright shining lights that would blinden you.
result.ponchtml: Solais loinnireaċa ġeala a ḃainfeaḋ an t-aṁarc as an tsúil agatBright shining lights that would blinden you.

result.eng: Plates of gold that would make you blind.
result.ga: Plátaí airgid a bhainfeadh an t-amharc as an tsúil agat
result.orig: Plátaí airgid a bhainfeadh an t-amharc as an tsúil agat
result.html: Plátaí airgid a bhainfeadh an t-amharc as an tsúil agatPlates of gold that would make you blind.
result.ponchtml: Plátaí airgid a ḃainfeaḋ an t-aṁarc as an tsúil agatPlates of gold that would make you blind.
